extension.description: [COLORred]Channels for app Kodi by KodiTVR.[/COLOR] [COLORwhite]Canais para o aplicativo Kodi da KodiTVR.[/COLOR] [COLORblue]KodiTVR is not responsible for the use of this add-on.
